name: Impetus
desc: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Dragon Blood
desc: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

name: Enrage
desc: Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take 80% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter. DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Battle Trance
desc: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.

name: Crypt Swarm
desc: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

name: Overgrowth
desc: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

name: Crystal Nova
desc: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

name: Living Armor
desc: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.

name: Reactive Armor
desc: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.

name: Echo Slam
desc: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
